Paul Marcel Berenger (a mụrụ na 26 Machị 1991), bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Zimbabwe.
A mụrụ Berenger n'abalị 26 ọnwa Machị afọ 1991 na Harare, Zimbabwe
Otú ọ dị, a manyere ya ịkwaga Australia n'okpuru ọnọdụ ala ọjọọ.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu, o nwere mmasị ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ hụrụ nwanne ya nwoke nke okenye n'elu nkwago n'egwuregwu ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị
Otú ọ dị, ọ malitere ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ na-akwaga Australia. Berenger mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na ihe nkiri 2008 Two Fists, One Heart
O mechara mee ọtụtụ ihe nkiri dị mkpirikpi dịka Brittany, Die Krankenhaus, The Army Within na Impasse
